interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Training Head Hairdressing Head Rainbow Synthetic Fiber Hair 24inch Mannequin Cosmetology Manikin Dolls Head for Hairdresser Styling Practicing with Free Clamp + DIY Hair Styling Braid Set
Review Date: 2021/05/20
Store: SENSAIRUITE
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'SENSAIRUITE', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '11.26 x 6.93 x 6.5 inches; 1.83 Pounds'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:3e9a0a4c1e05b8d79256b9b63cdd466f]] One of the main reasons I got this head was to use hot tools on it to practice before I used them on me. IT DOES NOT CURL!!!! It says that it does, but it doesn’t. I have tried 3-4 different hot tools and it won’t hold a curl at all. The hair is soft, it’s very thick. So if you wanted it just to do some braiding, it would work well for that. Not happy.
Review Title: DOES NOT CURL!!!!
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
BUTEFO 4 Pack Shower and Bath Set with Natural Boar Bristles Bath Brush, Pumice Stone Brush for Foot Callus, Dry Brush SPA Massage for Cellulite and Lymphatic, Natural Loofah Sponge for Women Kids
BUTEFO
{'Material': 'Sponge', 'Brand': 'BUTEFO', 'Power Source': 'Hand_powered', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Massage,Massaging,Tightening,Exfoliating', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '14.29 x 4.09 x 3.43 inches; 13.44 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'BUTEFO'}
I was really excited to have this back brush. But when I went to put it together it didn’t go... no matter how hard I tried! That was upsetting. I had to get my dremel out to sand it down so it fit better and it’s still not all the way on. With that said, the brush is super nice and scratchy on the back. And the foot brush/pumice stone is really nice too! I hope your brush combo has less flaws.
Didn’t fit

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Interaction**: Engaged with personal care products, emphasizing bath and shower accessories while recently exploring hairdressing tools.
- **Quality Expectations**: Places high value on product functionality and ease of use, maintaining a critical stance towards assembly issues and product performance. Expresses disappointment when products do not meet advertised capabilities, particularly in terms of usability.
- **Material Preference**: Shows interest in natural and synthetic materials, with a continued inclination towards eco-friendly or sustainable options. 
- **Product Benefits**: Seeks products that offer multifaceted benefits, including exfoliation, softening, and massaging, while also recently transitioning towards items that facilitate skill development in personal grooming.
- **User Experience**: Demonstrates a hands-on, practical approach, making modifications to optimize product fit and performance, reflecting a desire for effective and user-friendly solutions.
- **Target Audience**: Interested in products suitable for various users, including children, indicating a family-oriented mindset while also exploring specialized tools for personal styling practices.
- **Overall Sentiment**: Exhibits a mixed sentiment; appreciates quality when it aligns with expectations but expresses dissatisfaction when products fall short of performance claims or encounter usability issues. This latest experience reinforces the user's demand for reliability in functionality across all types of personal care products.
